title: Diary of a Compulsive Madness
description: Influenced by authors such as Hubert Selby Jr., Henry Rollins, William S. Burroughs, and Kafka. This book is partitioned into three parts. Part one is written like a journal. It's about an unknown person of unknown gender and age writing about their isolation. Part two is inspired by writings of Henry Rollins in which it is comprised of entries. And part three is a compilation of letters.
author: Waldo Austin
